title: Frank Zappa - The Best Band You Never Heard (original with Boler
description:
It seems it is hard for people who like Zappa to find this one.
It is the original CD release that includes Track 8, Disc 1 - Bolero.
I only share it now because the 'Bolero'  track was forcibly removed due to threats about copyright, eventually this CD was also removed. Like so many others, I didn't think it was fair, so this is for those people who were never fortunate enough to buy it before it was removed.

Made from the real thing as BIN files so as not to break up the tracks, thereby keeping the continuity and the disk in the original form. You will need to burn each disk to a CD, from there you can make whatever file format you chose.

I do not leave my computer on when I am not using it so please be patient and seed when you have it.
I have included reworked scans of the back and front, also scans of the leaflet but not the disks.
The leaflet is old so the scans are not brilliant.
